name: Dungeon Dice Monsters x Tetris (ft. no monsters)
name_original: Dungeon Dice Monsters x Tetris (ft. no monsters)
description:
Made by just me* in less than 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Theme: Roll of the Dice)

Controls: Z/X (Flipping), Scroll wheel (Rotate), Tab (Swap with Held dice)

There are 4 boards with different themes

Umm... Enjoy :)  [Play in Full Screen btw]

*I didn't make the sound assets and most of the particles

Known Bug: Sometimes a dice face might come off during unfolding.
